requestSentSuccessfully: Your request has been sent successfully

invalidPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
lawInformation: In accordance with Law 09-08, you have the right to access, rectify, and object to the processing of your personal data. This processing has been authorized by the CNDP under number A-S-259/2022.
acceptTerms: Please accept the terms and conditions
optimizeCollaboration: Optimize synergistic collaboration within your medical team to ensure effective and efficient management of your practice.
joinPracticeDescription: Join your practice for enhanced team collaboration and optimal management of your patients' records.
contactAdminMessage: Please contact the administrator of your cabinet to have yourself added to the team
addDocumentsInstruction: For fast and efficient processing, please provide the documents listed in the order mentioned below.
cooperationAppreciated: Your cooperation is greatly appreciated and essential to achieving our common goals.
acceptedFileFormats: Accepted file formats: PDF, JPG, PNG, DOCX.
copyCIN: Copy of the ID card of the practitioner responsible for the cabinet
documentsUnderReview: Your documents are under review. You will be notified once the verification is complete.
onlineAppointments: Online appointment booking for your patients
redirectMessage: Please note that you will be redirected to a secure external page to proceed with the payment of your subscription.
optForAutomaticWithdrawal: Opt for automatic withdrawal for simplified management!
automaticWithdrawalDescription: We are delighted to introduce you to a more convenient and efficient payment option: automatic withdrawal! Opt for this secure payment method now and simplify the management of your transactions.
benefitsOfAutomaticWithdrawal: The automatic withdrawal will allow you to settle your subscriptions and recurring payments without having to worry about doing it manually. No more missed payments or delays! Once set up, your account will be automatically debited according to the agreed upon deadlines.
activateAutomaticWithdrawal: To activate automatic withdrawal, simply contact us by pressing the button below. Our dedicated team will be delighted to guide you through the process and answer any questions you may have.
chooseConvenience: Choosing automatic withdrawal means choosing a convenient and hassle-free solution for your regular transactions. Simplify your financial management today!
thankYouForTrust: Thank you for your trust and preference for our platform.
demandUnderReview: Your request to add the cabinet is currently under review by the Clinital administrator. We will notify you as soon as it has been successfully processed.
pour_publier_votre_profil_sur_clinital: To publish your profile on Clinital
veuillez_parametrer_votre_agenda: Please configure your schedule by adding appointment slots.
en_cliquant_sur_le_bouton: By clicking the button below, you will make your profile visible
nous_vous_remercions: We thank you for joining our medical community.
votre_profil_a_ete_publie: Your profile has been published successfully
NO_SLOTS_AVAILABLE: You have no available or scheduled time slots
